title: Food by Coder web App
description: Made a food delivery web application using HTML, React, Node.js, and JavaScript, providing a seamless user experience Utilized MongoDB for efficient and scalable database management

title: Notes-Hub
description: Developed a secure Notes Writing app using the MERN stack, implementing authentication with JSON Web Tokens (JWT). This ensures user data is protected and accessible across devices.

title: Snake game
description: Experience the nostalgia with a modern twist in this JavaScript-crafted Snake game, responsive design. Relive the classic fun and challenge your reflexes - guide your snake to victory

title: Amazon Clone (UI only)
description: Developed a UI for an Amazon clone using HTML and CSS, focusing on responsive design and user-friendly navigation.
